page.title: 14QUARRIES IN ST.BREWARD AREA
page.content:
At the present day there are three working quarries in our area. they are Hantergantick, Delank and Tor Down. the biggest of these are in the Delank valley, they are Hantergantick and Delank. In the old days there were about six quarries in the area and because of this the village of St.Breward was quite well known and had nine shops, where as now there are only three.
{DELANK QUARRY:}No one really knows how long Delank Quarry has been working but it is thought to be about 250 years. Years ago they cut granite by hand but now use machines. However, recently a statue of nurse Edith Cavell was carved from granite taken from Delank using hand tools only.
